summary: Mobile app crashing on login for iPhone 14 Pro running iOS 17.2
suggested_reply: Thank you for the detailed information about the crash. This appears to be a known issue affecting some iOS 17.2 users that our team is actively working on. In the meantime, please try this workaround: 1) Delete the app completely, 2) Restart your phone, 3) Reinstall from the App Store, 4) Before logging in, go to Settings > Privacy and enable 'Allow App to Access Keychain'. If this doesn't resolve it, please reply with the crash_log.txt contents and we'll investigate further.
